versao1

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • versao1.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Item>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Livro

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Item>, java.io.Serializable
    Classe desenvolvida para a criação de um item e que implementa as interfaces Comparable e Serializable.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Icaro Forte, Marcos Antonio, Rayssa Naianny, Wandson Allys
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
